w-vant-cell.body: <van-cell title="单元格" value="内容" label="描述信息" border="{{ false }}" />

w-vant-datetime-picker.body:
<van-${1|datetime,date,time,year-month|}-picker
            type="datetime"
            value="{{ currentDate }}"
            min-date="{{ minDate }}"
            max-date="{{ maxDate }}"
            bind:input="onInput"
            />

w-vant-field.body:
<van-field
            type="${1|text,number,idcard,textarea,digit|}"
            value="{{ value }}"
            placeholder="请输入用户名"
            border="{{ false }}"
            bind:change="onChange"
          />

w-vant-radio.body:
<van-radio-group direction="${1|vertical,horizontal|}" value="{{ radio }}" bind:change="onChange">
          <van-radio shape="${2|round,square|}" name="1">单选框 1</van-radio>
          <van-radio name="2">单选框 2</van-radio>
        </van-radio-group>

w-vant-search.body: <van-search value="{{ value }}" placeholder="请输入搜索关键词" />

w-vant-action-sheet.body:
<van-action-sheet
          show="{{ show }}"
          actions="{{ actions }}"
          bind:close="onClose"
          bind:select="onSelect"
        />

w-vant-dropdown-menu.body:
<van-dropdown-menu>
          <van-dropdown-item value="{{ value1 }}" options="{{ option1 }}" />
          <van-dropdown-item value="{{ value2 }}" options="{{ option2 }}" />
        </van-dropdown-menu>

w-vant-share-sheet.body:
<van-share-sheet
          show="{{ showShare }}"
          title="立即分享给好友"
          options="{{ options }}"
          bind:select="onSelect"
          bind:close="onClose"
        />

w-vant-swipe-cell.body:
<van-swipe-cell right-width="{{ 65 }}" left-width="{{ 65 }}">
          <view slot="left">选择</view>
          <van-cell-group>
            <van-cell title="单元格" value="内容" />
          </van-cell-group>
          <view slot="right">删除</view>
        </van-swipe-cell>

w-vant-collapse.body:
<van-collapse value="{{ activeNames }}" bind:change="onChange">
          <van-collapse-item title="有赞微商城" name="1">
            提供多样店铺模板，快速搭建网上商城
          </van-collapse-item>
          <van-collapse-item title="有赞零售" name="2">
            网店吸粉获客、会员分层营销、一机多种收款，告别经营低效和客户流失
          </van-collapse-item>
          <van-collapse-item title="有赞美业" name="3" disabled>
            线上拓客，随时预约，贴心顺手的开单收银
          </van-collapse-item>
        </van-collapse>

w-vant-notice-bar.body:
<van-notice-bar
          left-icon="volume-o"
          text="在代码阅读过程中人们说脏话的频率是衡量代码质量的唯一标准。"
        />

w-vant-grid.body:
<van-grid>
          <van-grid-item icon="photo-o" text="文字" />
          <van-grid-item icon="photo-o" text="文字" />
          <van-grid-item icon="photo-o" text="文字" />
          <van-grid-item icon="photo-o" text="文字" />
        </van-grid>

w-vant-index-bar.body:
<van-index-bar>
          <view>
            <van-index-anchor index="A" />
            <van-cell title="文本" />
            <van-cell title="文本" />
            <van-cell title="文本" />
          </view>

          <view>
            <van-index-anchor index="B" />
            <van-cell title="文本" />
            <van-cell title="文本" />
            <van-cell title="文本" />
          </view>
        </van-index-bar>

w-vant-nav-bar.body:
<van-nav-bar
          title="标题"
          left-text="返回"
          right-text="按钮"
          left-arrow
          bind:click-left="onClickLeft"
          bind:click-right="onClickRight"
        />

w-vant-sidebar.body:
<van-sidebar active-key="{{ activeKey }}">
          <van-sidebar-item title="标签名" />
          <van-sidebar-item title="标签名" />
          <van-sidebar-item title="标签名" />
        </van-sidebar>

w-vant-tab.body:
<van-tabs type="${1|line,card|}" active="{{ active }}" bind:change="onChange">
          <van-tab title="标签 1">内容 1</van-tab>
          <van-tab title="标签 2">内容 2</van-tab>
          <van-tab title="标签 3">内容 3</van-tab>
          <van-tab title="标签 4">内容 4</van-tab>
        </van-tabs>

w-vant-tabbar.body:
<van-tabbar active="{{ active }}" bind:change="onChange">
          <van-tabbar-item icon="home-o">标签</van-tabbar-item>
          <van-tabbar-item icon="search">标签</van-tabbar-item>
          <van-tabbar-item icon="friends-o">标签</van-tabbar-item>
          <van-tabbar-item icon="setting-o">标签</van-tabbar-item>
        </van-tabbar>

w-vant-tree-select.body:
<van-tree-select
          items="{{ items }}"
          main-active-index="{{ mainActiveIndex }}"
          active-id="{{ activeId }}"
          bind:click-nav="onClickNav"
          bind:click-item="onClickItem"
        />

w-vant-card.body:
<van-card
          num="2"
          price="2.00"
          desc="描述信息"
          title="商品标题"
          thumb="{{ imageURL }}"
        />

w-vant-goods-action.body:
<van-goods-action>
          <van-goods-action-icon icon="chat-o" text="客服" bind:click="onClickIcon" />
          <van-goods-action-icon icon="cart-o" text="购物车" bind:click="onClickIcon" />
          <van-goods-action-button
            text="加入购物车"
            type="warning"
            bind:click="onClickButton"
          />
          <van-goods-action-button text="立即购买" bind:click="onClickButton" />
        </van-goods-action>
